definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: city in SW. Judah, exact site unknown, captured by Joshua, acc. to D, Jos 10:29, Jos 10:29, Jos 10:31, Jos 10:32, Jos 10:39, Jos 12:15 (all D), Jos 15:42 (P); Levit. city Jos 21:13 (P) = 1Ch 6:42; further 2Ki 8:22 = 2Ch 21:10, 2Ki 19:8 = Is 37:8, 2Ki 23:31 2Ki 24:18 = Je 52:1; LXX Lebna. Vid. Lag:Onom. 274, 135, 26; 2nd ed. 273 Lebna; Buhl:Geogr. 193.
station of Isr. in wilderness, between [[רִמּׂן פָָּרֶץ]] and [[רִסָּה]] Nu 33:20, Nu 33:21 (perh. = [[לָבָן]] De 1:1); LXX Lemwna, A LXXL Lebwna.
